Configuration

The Cep service uses the Dropwizard Metrics to build his metrics, by default it sends JVM metrics but you can register new metrics that will be exported too.

The metrics service has four properties to configure it:

Property Description Default Value
metric.enable Enable or disable metrics service false
metric.listeners The listener to send the metrics. Available listeners [“io.wizzie.ks.cep.metrics.ConsoleMetricListener”]
metric.interval The interval time to report metrics (milliseconds) 60000
metric.verbose.mode Enable the verbose metric mode false
